data.title: GAME CHANGERS ft. SHELDON REYNOLDS of EARTH, WIND & FIRE!
data.meta_description: Without question, Earth, Wind & Fire is one of the most prolific and highly celebrated music groups of our era. Their lyrics are inspirational, motivational, and entertaining. Their musicianship is impeccable, often imitated and constantly referred to by musicians both professional and aspiring. Sheldon Reynolds played an integral part in the sound of EWF as their lead guitarist for many years. As a vocalist, his voice lent to the timeless and instantly recognizeable structure of vocals that have become the groups signature sound. Now, as one of the foundation members of the tribute band for The Elements, Sheldon has release "Feel Good", the tribute project to their music, with revisions that will forever remain as timeless as the originals. Sheldon is also an accomplished songwriter' Grammy nominated for his contributions to the hit song "Sunday Morning", and is an incredible vocalist. But there's more. He is also an astronomer, author, and talk show host. Join me as I talk with him about his EWF years, current project, future ventures and more. I have 3 giveaways of his project (digitals). If you love EWF music, you will LOVE this!!!
data.text:
Without question, Earth, Wind & Fire is one of the most prolific and highly celebrated music groups of our era. Their lyrics are inspirational, motivational, and entertaining. Their musicianship is impeccable, often imitated and constantly referred to by musicians both professional and aspiring.

Sheldon Reynolds played an integral part in the sound of EWF as their lead guitarist for many years. As a vocalist, his voice lent to the timeless and instantly recognizeable structure of vocals that have become the groups signature sound. Now, as one of the foundation members of the tribute band for The Elements, Sheldon has release "Feel Good", the tribute project to their music, with revisions that will forever remain as timeless as the originals.
